00017 Saper::Saper(QWidget *parent, const char *name) :QWidget(parent, name)
00018 {
00019         int i,j;
00020     n=20; m=20;
00021     n_bombs=70;
00022         clearFocus();
00023         
00024     top = new QGridLayout(this,n+1,m,5,0);
00025         ind = new QLCDNumber(this);
00026         top->addMultiCellWidget(ind,1,1,0,3);
00027         ind->setSegmentStyle(QLCDNumber::Flat);
00028     buttons = new saper_buttons(col());
00029     mnu = new QMenuBar(this);
00030         pmnu = new QPopupMenu(this);
00031 
00032         QPixmap pix("images/newgame.bmp");
00033         pmnu->insertItem("New Game",this,SLOT(newgame()),Key_F2);
00034         pmnu->insertSeparator();
00035         pmnu->insertItem("Easy",this,SLOT(newgame()));
00036         pmnu->insertItem("Medium",this,SLOT(newgame()));
00037         pmnu->insertItem("Hard",this,SLOT(newgame()));
00038         pmnu->insertSeparator();
00039         pmnu->insertItem("Exit",this,SLOT(close()),Key_Escape);
00040         mnu->insertItem("Game",pmnu);
00041         
00042         
00043         mnu->show();
00044 
00045         pole = new cell*[n];
00046     for (i=0;i<n;i++){pole[i] = new cell[m];}
00047         
00048     char capt[10];
00049     QPushButton *cmd1;
00050     int i_col=0;
00051     for (i=0;i<n;i++)
00052                 for (j=0;j<m;j++)
00053                 {
00054                         itoa(pole[i][j].val,capt,10);
00055                         //cmd1=createButton(capt);
00056                         cmd1=createButton(" ");
00057                         top->addWidget(cmd1,i+2,j);
00058                         buttons->insert(i_col,cmd1);
00059                         i_col++;
00060                 }
00061         newgame();
00062 }

00064 void Saper::slotButtonClicked()
00065 {
00066         int x,y;
00067     int i;
00068 
00069         QPixmap pix("images/red_bomb.bmp");
00070     i  = buttons->findRef((QPushButton*)sender());
00071     QPushButton *cmd1;
00072     y=i%n;
00073         x=i/m;
00074 
00075         if(!pole[x][y].val){check(x,y);}
00076         else 
00077         {
00078                 cmd1 = buttons->at(i);
00079                 cmd1->setPixmap(pix);
00080                 for (i=0;i!=col();i++)
00081                 {
00082                     y=i%n;
00083                         x=i/m;
00084                         cmd1 = buttons->at(i);
00085                         if(pole[x][y].val){cmd1->setPixmap(pix);}
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 for (i=0;i!=col();i++)
00089                 {
00090                         cmd1 = buttons->at(i);
00091                         cmd1->disconnect();     
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 }

00096 void Saper::check(int x,int y)
00097 {
00098         int col=n*m;
00099         int i,k,l;
00100         int nn_bombs=0;
00101         i=x*n+y;
00102         if ((i<col)&&(i>=0))
00103         if ((x<n)&&(x>=0)&&(y<m)&&(y>=0))
00104         if (!pole[x][y].val)
00105         if (!pole[x][y].checked)
00106         {       
00107                 pole[x][y].checked = true;
00108                 cells_checked--;
00109                 if (cells_checked==0)
00110                 {
00111                         MessageBox(NULL,L"Congradulations!",NULL,MB_OK);
00112                         newgame();
00113                 }
00114                 QPushButton *cmd1 = buttons->at(i);
00115                 
00116                 for (k=x-1;k<x+2;k++)
00117                         for(l=y-1;l<y+2;l++)
00118                         {
00119                                 if ((k<n)&&(k>=0)&&(l<m)&&(l>=0))
00120                                 if (pole[k][l].val==true){nn_bombs++;}
00121                         }
00122                 
00123                 if (nn_bombs==0)
00124                 {
00125                         cmd1->hide();
00126                         for (k=x-1;k<x+2;k++)
00127                                 for(l=y-1;l<y+2;l++)
00128                                 {
00129                                         check(k,l);
00130                                 }
00131                 }
00132                 else 
00133                 {
00134                         switch (nn_bombs)
00135                         {
00136                         case 1: {QPixmap pix("images/one.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00137                         case 2: {QPixmap pix("images/two.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00138                         case 3: {QPixmap pix("images/three.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00139                         case 4: {QPixmap pix("images/four.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00140                         case 5: {QPixmap pix("images/five.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00141                         case 6: {QPixmap pix("images/six.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00142                         case 7: {QPixmap pix("images/seven.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00143                         case 8: {QPixmap pix("images/eight.bmp"); cmd1->setPixmap(pix); break;}
00144                         }
00145                 }
00146         }
00147 }

00149 QPushButton *Saper::createButton(const QString& str)
00150 {
00151     QPushButton *cmd = new QPushButton(str,this);
00152     cmd->setMaximumSize(17,17);
00153         cmd->clearFocus();
00154     connect(cmd,SIGNAL(clicked()),SLOT(slotButtonClicked()));
00155     return cmd;
00156 }

00158 void Saper::newgame()
00159 {
00160         int x,y,i,j,i_col=0;
00161         setFixedSize(n*17+5,m*17+5+50);
00162         bombs=n_bombs;
00163         ind->display(bombs);
00164         cells_checked=col();
00165         QPushButton *cmd1;
00166         for (i=0;i!=col();i++)
00167         {
00168             y=i%n;
00169                 x=i/m;
00170                 cmd1 = buttons->at(i);
00171                 cmd1->show();
00172                 cmd1->setText("");
00173                 cmd1->setDown(false);
00174                 connect(cmd1,SIGNAL(clicked()),SLOT(slotButtonClicked()));
00175         }
00176     for (i=0;i<n;i++)for(j=0;j<m;j++)
00177         {
00178                 pole[i][j].x=i;
00179                 pole[i][j].y=j;
00180                 pole[i][j].checked=false;
00181                 pole[i][j].val=false;
00182         }
00183         srand(time(NULL)); 
00184     for (i=0;i<n_bombs;)
00185     {
00186                 x=rand()%n;
00187                 y=rand()%m;
00188                 if (!(pole[x][y].val)){pole[x][y].val=true;i++;}
00189     }
00190 }

00195         QPushButton *cmd1;
00196         QPixmap pix("images/flag.bmp");
00197         if (e->button()==QMouseEvent::RightButton)

00205                         {
00206                                 if ((pole[x][y].val)&&(!pole[x][y].checked))

00217                                 }
00218                                 if (!(cmd1->pixmap()))
00219                                 {
00220                                         cmd1->setPixmap(pix);
00221                                 }
00222                                 else if (!pole[x][y].val){cells_checked++;cmd1->setText("");}
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225         }
